about_the_game:
HISTORY:

Join a rescue mission where you'll balance urgent humanitarian efforts with groundbreaking scientific exploration. Uncover an ancient secret and gather crucial data, all while providing lifesaving aid to those in need.

With homes reduced to rubble and lives hanging in the balance, the Rescue Team has been dispatched to the center of the latest disaster. Led by a familiar geologist, they must navigate treacherous terrains to assess the full extent of the disaster. But amidst the chaos, a startling discovery is made: an earthquake has unveiled a hidden passage to unexplored realms untouched by modern civilization.

Meet an all-new arrival in the world of disaster relief: a long lost secret from an ancient civilization that is on a mission to find the parts needed to assemble an ancient defense mechanism that could change the fate of the world. Facing overwhelming odds, it’s down to you to overcome the many obstacles thrown your way and build a better world for all.

Are you ready to make history? Join the adventure and shape the future with Rescue Team: Ancient Guardian!

Gameplay

In Rescue Team: Ancient Guardian, as in any time manager you have to accurately calculate the time for building, collecting resources and timely use of bonuses.

The game has a large variety of buildings and unique items, collecting them you will perform tasks and participate in unique adventures.

Collect a squad of rescuers, perform a variety of tasks to save people and animals, restore buildings and extinguish fires, and most importantly - solve the mystery of an ancient civilization.

Game Features:

  • Complete 65 levels

  • Catchy downloadable Original Soundtrack

  • Beautiful desktop wallpapers

  • Earn dozens of achievements

  • Lead the investigation and collect a collection of photos

  • Upgrade equipment, level up heroes

  • Robotics department

  • Game Encyclopedia

  • Collection of stickers

  • Find all the parts for the engineering lab

  • Find all ancient scrolls

name: Rescue Team: Ancient Guardian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with at least 512MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Join a rescue mission where you'll balance urgent humanitarian efforts with groundbreaking scientific exploration. Navigate treacherous terrains to assess the full extent of the disaster as well as the world-changing discovery made amidst the chaos!
